name: backbone-sql
description: PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite3 storage for BackboneORM
author: Gwilym Humphreys (https://github.com/gwilymhumphreys)

scripts.test: npm run build; npm run test-postgres; npm run test-mysql; npm run test-rest-all
scripts.pre-test-rest: npm run backbone-rest vendor-install && cd node_modules/backbone-rest && npm ls >/dev/null || npm install
scripts.test-rest: npm run backbone-rest vendor-install && mocha --require test/parameters_postgres --require backbone-rest/test/parameters_express3 'node_modules/backbone-rest/test/spec/**/*.tests.coffee' --grep ''
scripts.build_dep: npm run-script backbone-orm build; npm run-script backbone-rest build
scripts.watch_dep: npm run-script backbone-orm watch; npm run-script backbone-rest watch
